articles.title: Bluesky finally adds drafts - TechCrunch
articles.description: The move comes as Bluesky’s competitors, X and Threads, have long supported drafts.
articles.content: Social network Bluesky is finally rolling out one of users’ most-requested features: drafts. Blueskys competitors, X and Threads, have long supported the ability to write drafts, which is seen as a b… [+911 chars]

articles.author: Ryan Whitwam
articles.title: Google experiments with locking YouTube Music lyrics behind paywall - Ars Technica
articles.description: After a lengthy test, YouTube Music is making lyrics a premium feature.

articles.title: Immune Cells Meant To Fight Cancer Are Secretly Helping Tumors Grow - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Researchers have found that tumors can rewire neutrophils to promote cancer growth rather than suppress it.
articles.content: Cancer growth is shaped not only by malignant cells but by subtle changes in the immune environment surrounding them. New findings point to a shift in neutrophil behavior within tumours that consiste… [+5135 chars]
